category.name: wbb.acp.board
category.item: Do you really want to copy this forum? All settings and permissions will be copied over; Content and Statistics will not be copied.
Recursively copy all sub forums, categories and links.
Posts are used to calculate similar threads
Display sub-forums on board list page
Forces selected style upon board visit
Do you really want to delete the forum “{$boardNode->getBoard()->title|language}”?
This forum is no longer visible on the forum list, but may be accessed through a direct link.
You must select at least “Copy permissions” or “Copy moderators”.
You have made unsaved changes to the permissions. Do you really want to discard these changes and continue?

The permission status ( Grant and Deny) represents the effective permissions. The status accounts the inheritance rules, inheriting permissions from parent forums and categories. You can explicitly overwrite inherited permissions for each children.

The permission status accounts the effective permissions granted or denied by all user groups the user “{$user->username}” is member of.

The permission status ( Grant and Deny) represents the effective permissions. The status accounts the inheritance rules, inheriting permissions from parent forums and categories. You can explicitly overwrite inherited permissions for each children.

category.name: wbb.acp.bulkProcessing
category.item:
The chosen action affected {#$affectedThreads} thread{if $affectedThreads != 1}s{/if}.{if $affectedThreads > 0}
Please make sure to “Verify Integrity” afterwards.{/if}
Bulk processing of threads will be processed without further confirmation for all threads matching your criteria.

The chosen action affected {#$affectedPosts} post{if $affectedPosts != 1}s{/if}.{if $affectedPosts > 0}
Please make sure to “Verify Integrity” afterwards.{/if}
Bulk processing of posts will be processed without further confirmation for all posts matching your criteria.

category.name: wbb.acp.rssFeed
category.item: External RSS feeds are periodically fetched and new content will be posted as threads.
Do you really want to delete the RSS Feed “{$feed->title}”?
Consider only entries containing one or more keyword provide above, all other entries will be skipped. Separate multiple keywords with a comma.
The RSS Feed will be checked for new entries based upon the configured frequency.

Limits the number of new entries fetched with every run. You can disable this limit by setting the value “0”. It is recommended to limit the number of new entries for RSS feeds rapidly providing many entries.
Threads will be created in the chosen forum.
Threads will be associated with the chosen language.
Threads will be created using the chosen author.
You can specify multiple threads separated with a comma, these tags will be added to the created threads.
You must create at least one forum before you are able to add RSS feeds.
Use categories of imported entries as tags

category.item: Double-Click to Mark This Forum Read
{if $board->getThreads() > 0}No threads in this forum matched your criteria{else}There are no threads in this forum{/if}.

category.name: wbb.condition
category.item: The notice will only be displayed if the active user is in one of the selected boards. Multiple items can be selected by holding the “Ctrl/Shift” key (Windows) or “Command” (Mac OS) key and clicking on the desired items.

category.name: wbb.index
category.item:
{#$stats[members]} Member{if $stats.members != 1}s{/if} - {#$stats[threads]} Thread{if $stats[threads] != 1}s{/if} - {#$stats[posts]} Post{if $stats[posts] != 1}s{/if} ({#$stats[postsPerDay]} Post{if $stats[postsPerDay] != 1}s{/if} Per Day) {if $stats[newestMember]}
Latest Member: {$stats[newestMember]->username}.{/if}
Forum Software: Burning Board®{if SHOW_VERSION_NUMBER} {@PACKAGE_VERSION}{/if}, developed by WoltLab® GmbH

category.name: wbb.post
category.item: This post was deleted {if $post->userID == $post->getLogEntry()->userID}by the author themselves{else}by {$post->getLogEntry()->username}{/if}{if $post->getLogEntry()->reason}: {$post->getLogEntry()->reason}{/if} ({@$post->getLogEntry()->time|time}).
Post was deleted, no further information available.

{if $post->editCount}Post was edited {#$post->editCount} time{if $post->editCount != 1}s{/if}, last by {if $post->editorID}{$post->editor}{else}{$post->editor}{/if}{if $post->editReason}: {$post->editReason}{/if} ({@$post->lastEditTime|time}).{/if}{if $thread->getBoard()->getModeratorPermission('canEditPost') && $post->hasOldVersions()}{if $post->editCount} — {/if}There are saved old versions of this post{/if}
Do you really want to delete this post?
All displayed posts will be merged into the first post. Sort posts by drag & drop to determine the first post and the merge order.
Merged {if $postOrder|count == 1}a post{else}{#$postOrder|count} posts{/if} created by {implode from=$usernames item='username'}{$username}{/implode} into this post.
Do you really want to move this post to trash bin?
Thread will be closed after your post has been created.
Please specify a publishing date, the thread/post will remain disabled until then.
The specified date is invalid, you must chose a future date.
This post will be published on {@$post->enableTime|plainTime}.
Adds this thread to your watch list.

{if $count < 4}{@$authors[0]->getAnchorTag()}{if $count != 1}{if $count == 2 && !$guestTimesTriggered} and {else}, {/if}{@$authors[1]->getAnchorTag()}{if $count == 3}{if !$guestTimesTriggered} and {else}, {/if} {@$authors[2]->getAnchorTag()}{/if}{/if}{if $guestTimesTriggered} and {if $guestTimesTriggered == 1}a guest{else}guests{/if}{/if}{else}{@$authors[0]->getAnchorTag()}{if $guestTimesTriggered},{else} and{/if} {#$others} other users {if $guestTimesTriggered}and {if $guestTimesTriggered == 1}a guest{else}guests{/if}{/if}{/if} replied to the thread {$message->getThread()->topic}.

{if $count < 4}{@$authors[0]->username}{if $count != 1}{if $count == 2 && !$guestTimesTriggered} and {else}, {/if}{@$authors[1]->username}{if $count == 3}{if !$guestTimesTriggered} and {else}, {/if} {@$authors[2]->username}{/if}{/if}{if $guestTimesTriggered} and {if $guestTimesTriggered == 1}a guest{else}guests{/if}{/if}{else}{@$authors[0]->username}{if $guestTimesTriggered},{else} and{/if} {#$others} other users {if $guestTimesTriggered}and {if $guestTimesTriggered == 1}a guest{else}guests{/if}{/if}{/if} replied to the thread "{$message->getThread()->topic}" in forum "{@$userNotificationObject->getThread()->getBoard()->title|language}": {link controller='Thread' object=$userNotificationObject->getThread() application='wbb' isEmail=true}postID={@$userNotificationObject->postID}{/link}#post{@$userNotificationObject->postID}
{@$author->getAnchorTag()} likes your post in the thread {$thread->topic}.

{if $count < 4}{@$authors[0]->getAnchorTag()}{if $count == 2} and {else}, {/if}{@$authors[1]->getAnchorTag()}{if $count == 3} and {@$authors[2]->getAnchorTag()}{/if}{else}{@$authors[0]->getAnchorTag()} and {#$others} others{/if} like your post in the thread {$thread->topic}.
{if $author->userID}{@$author->getAnchorTag()}{else}A guest{/if} quoted one of your posts in the thread {$userNotificationObject->getThread()->topic}.
{if $author->userID}{@$author->getAnchorTag()}{else}A guest{/if} mentioned you in the thread {$userNotificationObject->getThread()->topic}.
Message is too short, it must contain at least {#$minCharLength} characters.
Message is too short, it must contain at least {#$minWordCount} words.

You have already written a post within the last {if $__wcf->getSession()->getPermission('user.board.floodControlTime') > 1}{#$__wcf->getSession()->getPermission('user.board.floodControlTime')} seconds{else}second{/if}. You have to wait at least {#$lastPostTime+$__wcf->getSession()->getPermission('user.board.floodControlTime')-TIME_NOW} second{if ($lastPostTime+$__wcf->getSession()->getPermission('user.board.floodControlTime')-TIME_NOW) != 1}s{/if} before attempting to write a new one.

The last reply in this thread was written by you, {if $seconds == -1}you may not reply again until another person has replied to this thread.{else}you may not reply up until {if $seconds == 1}one second{else}{#$seconds} seconds{/if} again.{/if}
Newly created posts need to be manually approved prior to publication, other users cannot see this post until it has been approved.
This post requires approval by a moderator, until then it will remain invisible for others.
Your post requires manual approval and will not be displayed until then.
Thread will be marked as done after post creation.
Move this post to trash bin

category.name: wcf.acp.option
category.item: Hot Threads are determined by the ratio of replies and views and age. The amount of replies / views needed to stay hot increases with the age.
Shows only threads within the given time frame.
Display notice for threads in trash bin
Maximum depth of forums shown on the forums list
Show last post of each forum
Show thread and post count for each forum
Show thread language with a flag
Show page numbers on thread list
Allows users to navigate to a specific page within a thread.
Allow marking of threads as done
Editing within this period does not show an edit note [time in minutes]
Marks threads as dated based on the time of last reply [time in days]. Users attempting to reply to this thread will receive a notice.
Number of previous replies displayed on the extended reply form.
Links for moved threads will be removed after this period. [time in days, 0 to disable]
Threads and posts within the trash bin will be removed after this period. [time in days, 0 to disable]
Show note for posts in trash bin
Posts in trash bin will be replaced with a notice on post list
Users can assign tags to each thread which will be also displayed in the tag cloud.
Threads will be marked as done based on the time of last reply [time in days, 0 to disable]
Allows users to ignore individual forums.
Notify of similar threads during thread creation
Searches for similar thread based on the thread title and displays a list of matches.
Include post message in email notifications
Notifications for watched threads, mentions or quotes will include the post’s message.
Last reply of similar threads must not be prior this period [time in days]
Threads within this forum will be displayed as News on Dashboard.
Creation of threads must not be prior this period. [time in days]
Creation of threads must not be prior this period. [time in days]
